summary: Implemented a global Binance-styled promo ticker, introduced an auto-refreshing BTC/USDT rate hook and integrated it into pricing displays, compacted denomination cards with Binance-themed styling, and (per SiteLayout summary) removed the caffeine.ai footer branding. Also includes several additional UI/robustness changes not requested (e.g., admin visibility logic, error boundary/hardening).

hallucinated_features.description: Added new global error boundary/fallback behavior around the app (GlobalErrorBoundary/GlobalErrorFallbackPage).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; BuildRequest focuses on ticker, pricing refresh, card density/theme, and footer branding removal.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed admin link visibility logic and added extra safety wrappers (e.g., SafeSection around RecentOrdersMenu).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; this is additional access-control/robustness behavior.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (SiteLayout summary mentions “hardened admin link visibility”)

hallucinated_features.description: Added localStorage caching, cached/fallback source labeling, and badges for BTC rate source.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 requires auto-refresh and graceful loading/fallback, but explicit caching/source badges and localStorage persistence are additional features beyond the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Promo ticker includes emoji characters and repeated message blocks with icons.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1/REQ-2 specify style/copy content requirements but do not request emojis, iconography, or repetition strategy; these are extra presentation choices.
evidence: frontend/src/components/layout/PromoTicker.tsx (promoMessage includes emojis; repeats message 3 times with Zap/Clock/Gift icons)
